entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:29 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:29 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 6:29 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
